name: Cubo Chaos
description:
In A Cubic Organized World 

Cubo Was Walking Right Out Of His Birthday Party 

When The World Split In Half And He Was Swallowed To The Chaos Dimension 

Help Him Get To The Portals That Will Get Him Home Safe  ! 

.

.

Controls : Arrows or A & D & SpaceBar 

Esc to Get Back To The Main Menu

 Music By : Airtone 

Programming and Design By : Jey 

Theme : Let There Be Chaos 

Jam : Brackeys Jam 

DBL Jey Studios ©
